scriptLines:
query: 'SELECT CAST(PERIOD AS DateTime) PERIOD
,INTERVAL
,[TIME]
,[ChillerName]
,[HvacRunStatus]
,LEFT(REPLACE([TIME],':',''),4)[MINUTE]
,cast(ChillerTempEnter as int)ChillerTempEnter
,cast(ChillerTempLeave as int) ChillerTempLeave
,CAST(PERIOD AS DATE) AS [DATE]
,FORMAT(PERIOD, N'yyyymmddhhmmss')TIMEKEY
FROM(




/******15 MINUTES INTERVALS ******/





(SELECT DATEADD(MINUTE, [15 MINUTES] * 15, '2010-01-01T00:00:00') AS PERIOD
,'15 MINUTES' AS INTERVAL
,[ChillerName]
,[HvacRunStatus]
,[TIME]
,AVG(ChillerTempEnter) ChillerTempEnter
,AVG(ChillerTempLeave)ChillerTempLeave
FROM(SELECT DISTINCT CAST([DatetimeUTC] AS DATE) [DATE],[ChillerTempEnter],[ChillerTempLeave],[ChillerName]
,[HvacRunStatus]
,CAST(DateTimeUTC as time) [TIME]
,DATEDIFF(MINUTE, '2010-01-01T00:00:00',[DateTimeUTC])/15 AS [15 MINUTES]
FROM [DBO].[HVACUnitIntermediate]
where [ChillerName] in ('SMARTSPACE-HVAC01-IOTDEVICE', 'SMARTSPACE-HVAC02-IOTDEVICE', 'SMARTSPACE-HVAC03-IOTDEVICE')



)A
GROUP BY [15 MINUTES],[ChillerName],[HvacRunStatus], [TIME]
)
UNION ALL





/****** HOURLY INTERVALS *****/





(SELECT DATEADD(MINUTE, [HOURLY] * 60, '2010-01-01T00:00:00') AS PERIOD
,'HOURLY' AS INTERVAL
,[ChillerName]
,[HvacRunStatus]
,[TIME]
,AVG(ChillerTempEnter) ChillerTempEnter
,AVG(ChillerTempLeave)ChillerTempLeave
FROM(SELECT DISTINCT CAST([DateTimeUTC] AS DATE) [DATE],[ChillerTempEnter],[ChillerTempLeave],[ChillerName]
,[HvacRunStatus]
,CAST(DateTimeUTC as time) [TIME]
,DATEDIFF(MINUTE, '2010-01-01T00:00:00',[DateTimeUTC])/60 AS [HOURLY]
FROM [DBO].[HVACUnitIntermediate]
where [ChillerName] in ('SMARTSPACE-HVAC01-IOTDEVICE', 'SMARTSPACE-HVAC02-IOTDEVICE', 'SMARTSPACE-HVAC03-IOTDEVICE')



)A
GROUP BY [HOURLY],[ChillerName],[HvacRunStatus]
,[TIME]
))B',

query: '/****** Script for SelectTopNRows command from SSMS  ******/
select
cast( [SMARTSPACE-HVAC01-IOTDEVICE] as int) [SMARTSPACE-HVAC01-IOTDEVICE]
,cast( [SMARTSPACE-HVAC02-IOTDEVICE] as int) [SMARTSPACE-HVAC02-IOTDEVICE]
,cast( [SMARTSPACE-HVAC03-IOTDEVICE] as int) [SMARTSPACE-HVAC03-IOTDEVICE]
,cast((isnull([SMARTSPACE-HVAC01-IOTDEVICE],0)+ isnull([SMARTSPACE-HVAC02-IOTDEVICE],0) + isnull([SMARTSPACE-HVAC03-IOTDEVICE],0))as int) [Total_kW]
,cast((isnull([SMARTSPACE-HVAC01-IOTDEVICE],0)+ isnull([SMARTSPACE-HVAC02-IOTDEVICE],0) + isnull([SMARTSPACE-HVAC03-IOTDEVICE],0)) as FLOAT) /4 [Aprx_kWh]
,Period [datetime]
from (SELECT DATEADD(MINUTE, [HOURLY] * 60, '2010-01-01T00:00:00') AS PERIOD
,'HOURLY' AS INTERVAL
,[PlantName]
,AVG([REALPOWER]) RealPower
FROM(SELECT DISTINCT [DatetimeUTC] AS [DATE],[PlantName],[REALPOWER]
,DATEDIFF(MINUTE, '2010-01-01T00:00:00',[DatetimeUTC])/60 AS [HOURLY]
FROM [DBO].[EnergyDataIntermediate]



)A
GROUP BY [HOURLY],[PlantName],RealPower
)b
PIVOT
(SUM(REALPOWER)
FOR [PlantName]
IN ([SMARTSPACE-HVAC01-IOTDEVICE],[SMARTSPACE-HVAC02-IOTDEVICE],[SMARTSPACE-HVAC03-IOTDEVICE])
)
AS PIVOTTABLE
WHERE [SMARTSPACE-HVAC01-IOTDEVICE] IS NOT NULL OR [SMARTSPACE-HVAC02-IOTDEVICE] IS NOT NULL OR [SMARTSPACE-HVAC03-IOTDEVICE] IS NOT NULL',

query: 'SELECT CAST(PERIOD AS DATETIME) PERIOD, INTERVAL
,ROUND(THERMOMETER,0)THERMOMETER
,ROUND(ANEMOMETER,0) ANEMOMETER
,ROUND(HYGROMETER,0) HYGROMETER
,ROUND(SOLAR_RADIATION_SENSOR,0) SOLAR_RADIATION_SENSOR
,ROUND(_10_MINUTE_WIND_GUST,0) _10_MINUTE_WIND_GUST
,CAST(PERIOD AS DATE) AS [DATE]
,FORMAT(PERIOD, N'yyyyMMddHHmmss')TIMEKEY
FROM(

/******15 MINUTES INTERVALS ******/

(SELECT DATEADD(MINUTE, [15 MINUTES] * 15, '2010-01-01T00:00:00') AS PERIOD
,'15 MINUTES' AS INTERVAL
,AVG(THERMOMETER) THERMOMETER
,AVG([ANEMOMETER])ANEMOMETER
,AVG([HYGROMETER])HYGROMETER
,AVG([SOLAR_RADIATION_SENSOR])SOLAR_RADIATION_SENSOR
,AVG([_10_MINUTE_WIND_GUST])_10_MINUTE_WIND_GUST
FROM(SELECT DISTINCT CAST([DATE] AS DATE) [DATE], THERMOMETER
,ANEMOMETER
,HYGROMETER
,SOLAR_RADIATION_SENSOR
,_10_MINUTE_WIND_GUST
,DATEDIFF(MINUTE, '2010-01-01T00:00:00',[DATETIME])/15 AS [15 MINUTES]
FROM [DBO].[WeatherHistoric]
)A
GROUP BY [15 MINUTES]
)
UNION ALL

/****** HOURLY INTERVALS *****/

(SELECT DATEADD(MINUTE, [HOURLY] * 60, '2010-01-01T00:00:00') AS PERIOD
,'HOURLY' AS INTERVAL
,AVG(THERMOMETER) THERMOMETER
,AVG([ANEMOMETER])ANEMOMETER
,AVG([HYGROMETER])HYGROMETER
,AVG([SOLAR_RADIATION_SENSOR])SOLAR_RADIATION_SENSOR
,AVG([_10_MINUTE_WIND_GUST])_10_MINUTE_WIND_GUST
FROM(SELECT DISTINCT CAST([DATE] AS DATE) [DATE], THERMOMETER
,ANEMOMETER
,HYGROMETER
,SOLAR_RADIATION_SENSOR
,_10_MINUTE_WIND_GUST
,DATEDIFF(MINUTE, '2010-01-01T00:00:00',[DATETIME])/60 AS [HOURLY]
FROM [DBO].[WeatherHistoric]
)A
GROUP BY [HOURLY]
))B',
